my_business: At Synx, we help businesses become future-ready by integrating AI, automation, and IT solutions into their core operations. We specialize in custom software development, web solutions, and SaaS platforms that solve real-world problems. Our product suite includes AI-powered tools like Synx+ for review management, Synx Go for intelligent email handling, Synx Travel for automated itinerary planning, and more. Whether it's streamlining operations, building digital experiences, or automating workflows, we deliver scalable, user-centric solutions that drive efficiency and growth.
top_product: Our custom software solutions and product suite: SynxUP – End-to-end custom development for businesses needing tailored SaaS, apps, or internal tools Synx Lite – Lightning-fast single-page websites for professionals Synx Go – Smart email and task automation platform Synx Tra – AI itinerary planner for travel companies and planners Synx+ – AI-powered review management for online reputation
ideal_referral: A business owner, decision-maker, or operations manager looking to digitize or scale their business. Ideal referrals include companies in hospitality, travel, retail, services, healthcare, and education
top_problem_solved: A leading regional travel agency was managing bookings manually across spreadsheets and emails. We built them a fully automated itinerary management and customer portal that saved them 60+ hours a month, improved customer satisfaction, and positioned them for scaling nationally.

name: Neetha Krishnakumar
company_address: Spacecloud, Kuravankonam market junction, Thiruvananthapuram, Keraa, 695003
my_business: We are an architectural consultancy firm, specialising in hospitality and residential and builder projects. When it comes to space, we believe in intelligent utilization to optimize functionality and enhance the overall experience. Our team of experienced architects meticulously analyses each project, ensuring efficient layouts and seamless flow between areas. By thoughtfully considering the spatial requirements, we create designs that are both practical and inspiring, tailor-made to our clients' unique needs.
top_product: Apartment Mps absolut TAJ Kollam, Thirumullavaram Kodaikanal resort project
ideal_referral: Builder Commercial projects Hospitality projects
top_problem_solved: A client was struggling with constant heat and poor ventilation in their newly purchased commercial space. They approached us through a BNI referral. At Space Cloud, we redesigned the layout with passive cooling techniques, introduced skylights for natural ventilation, and optimized the spatial flow without major structural changes. Within weeks, the space felt cooler, brighter, and more productive. The client was thrilled not just with the comfort, but with the energy savings too. This project proved how good design can solve real problems. And it all began with one powerful BNI connection.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favourite BNI moments was when a fellow member referred me to a client who had just purchased land for their dream home. What started as a small design discussion became a full-fledged architectural project, including interiors and landscaping. The client was so impressed, they referred two more families, both of whom became long-term clients. All this happened because of one trusted BNI referral. It reminded me how powerful our network truly is not just for business growth, but for building lasting trust and relationships.

name: Pradeeshkumar MS
company_address: 13 N, Sowparnika city crown, Near NGO quarters, Poojappura, Karamana, Trivandrum, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, 695002
my_business:
Digital Insurance Solutions
Client based customized products.
Existing coverage Correction
Guidance for new proposals
Claims assistance
top_product: Health Insurance: Provides coverage for medical expenses, including hospitalization, surgeries, and treatments, ensuring financial security during health emergencies. Motor Insurance: Mandatory for all vehicles, this covers damages to your vehicle, third-party liabilities, and even personal accident protection for drivers and passengers. Home Insurance: Safeguards your home and its contents against risks like fire, theft, natural disasters, and other unforeseen events. Travel Insurance: Offers coverage for unexpected situations during trips, such as medical emergencies, trip cancellations, lost baggage, or passport. Personal Accident Insurance: Provides financial support in case of accidents leading to injury, disability, or death, ensuring the well-being of your loved ones. Commercial Insurance: Designed for businesses, this includes coverage for property, liability, employees, and risks specific to business operations. Critical Illness Insurance: Covers life-threatening illnesses like cancer, heart attacks, or kidney failure, providing a lump sum to cover high medical costs.
ideal_referral: An ideal referral for your health insurance services, especially targeting newly married couples, would involve individuals or couples who are in the early stages of planning their future together. Why Newly Married Couples? Health Security Planning: Newly married couples often start planning their long-term financial and health security. They are likely to consider health insurance to mitigate unforeseen medical expenses. Maternity Benefits Interest: This demographic is particularly interested in maternity-related benefits, as they may plan to start a family soon. Offering policies that cover maternity, newborn care, and related expenses makes your service highly relevant. Tax Benefits: Couples might also be looking for tax-saving instruments, and health insurance offers substantial benefits under Section 80D of the Income Tax Act in India. Customizable Policies: Newlyweds may prefer comprehensive health coverage that adapts to their future needs, including adding dependents.
top_problem_solved: Through BNI, I’ve had the opportunity to address some of the most pressing concerns faced by individuals and businesses when it comes to insurance. One of the top issues solved is ensuring comprehensive coverage for families and businesses, particularly those unsure about which policies to choose. With expert guidance, I’ve helped clients secure customized insurance plans that protect their homes, vehicles, and health—giving them peace of mind. Another common challenge is navigating the complexities of group insurance for businesses. By partnering with fellow BNI members, I’ve facilitated the provision of group health and employee benefit plans, ensuring employees are well-protected, which helps companies maintain a happy and secure workforce. BNI has truly been a platform where trust and referrals work in synergy, solving complex insurance problems for clients and businesses alike.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most cherished experiences in BNI is witnessing how relationships, not just referrals, have transformed my journey. Through genuine connections, I've gained trusted friends, mentors, and collaborators who support not only my business but also my personal growth. It's amazing how a platform designed for business can create relationships that feel like family. Whether it’s sharing advice, celebrating milestones, or standing by each other in challenges, the relationships I've built here are invaluable and remind me that success is sweeter when shared.
